title: Operation picul stick
creator_credit: Richard Mason, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Jack Rogers
brief_description: Dramatises the scope for improved methods in a typical small factory, showing how production can be improved by better safety measures and simple handling of equipment. New equipment is installed, methods improved and results achieved.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Mason, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Jack Rogers
